verses.text: Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w Keep|strong="H8104"\w* ye \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w justice|strong="H6666"\w*: for my \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* \add is\add* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* to \w come|strong="H0935"\w*, and my \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w* to be \w revealed|strong="H1540"\w*.\f + \fr 56.1 \ft judgment: or, equity\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H0835"\w* \add is\add* the \w man|strong="H0582"\w* \add that\add* \w doeth|strong="H6213"\w* this, and the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w* \add that\add* layeth \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* on it; that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* from \w polluting|strong="H2490"\w* it, and \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* his \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* from \w doing|strong="H6213"\w* any \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.

¶ Neither let the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w stranger|strong="H5236"\w*, that hath \w joined|strong="H3867"\w* himself to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \w speak|strong="H0559"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* hath \w utterly|strong="H0914"\w* \w separated|strong="H0914"\w* me from his \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: neither let the \w eunuch|strong="H5631"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, I \add am\add* a \w dry|strong="H3002"\w* \w tree|strong="H6086"\w*.

For thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* unto the \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w* that \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* my \w sabbaths|strong="H7676"\w*, and \w choose|strong="H0977"\w* \add the things\add* that \w please|strong="H2654"\w* me, and take \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*;

Even unto them will I \w give|strong="H5414"\w* in mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* and within my \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* a \w place|strong="H3027"\w* and a \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w better|strong="H2896"\w* than of \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and of \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*: I will \w give|strong="H5414"\w* them an \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, that shall not be cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w*.

Also the \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w stranger|strong="H5236"\w*, that \w join|strong="H3867"\w* themselves to the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to \w serve|strong="H8334"\w* him, and to \w love|strong="H0157"\w* the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, to be his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, every one that \w keepeth|strong="H8104"\w* the \w sabbath|strong="H7676"\w* from \w polluting|strong="H2490"\w* it, and taketh \w hold|strong="H2388"\w* of my \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*;

Even them will I \w bring|strong="H0935"\w* to my \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and make them \w joyful|strong="H8055"\w* in my \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w*: their burnt \w offerings|strong="H5930"\w* and their \w sacrifices|strong="H2077"\w* \add shall be\add* \w accepted|strong="H7522"\w* upon mine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*; for mine \w house|strong="H1004"\w* shall be \w called|strong="H7121"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* for all \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

The \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd* which \w gathereth|strong="H6908"\w* the \w outcasts|strong="H1760"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w saith|strong="H5002"\w*, Yet will I \w gather|strong="H6908"\w* \add others\add* to him, beside those that are \w gathered|strong="H6908"\w* unto him.\f + \fr 56.8 \ft beside…: Heb. to his gathered\f*

¶ All ye \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, \w come|strong="H0857"\w* to \w devour|strong="H0398"\w*, \add yea\add*, all ye \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* in the \w forest|strong="H3293"\w*.

His \w watchmen|strong="H6822"\w* \add are\add* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*: they are all \w ignorant|strong="H3045"\w*, they \add are\add* all \w dumb|strong="H0483"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w*, they \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* \w bark|strong="H5024"\w*; \w sleeping|strong="H1957"\w*, lying \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, \w loving|strong="H0157"\w* to \w slumber|strong="H5123"\w*.\f + \fr 56.10 \ft sleeping: or, dreaming, or, talking in their sleep\f*

Yea, \add they are\add* \w greedy|strong="H5794"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \add which\add* \w can|strong="H3045"\w* never \w have|strong="H3045"\w* \w enough|strong="H7654"\w*, and they \add are\add* \w shepherds|strong="H7462"\w* \add that\add* cannot \w understand|strong="H0995"\w*: they all \w look|strong="H6437"\w* to their own \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* for his \w gain|strong="H1215"\w*, from his \w quarter|strong="H7097"\w*.\f + \fr 56.11 \ft greedy: Heb. strong of appetite\f*\f + \fr 56.11 \ft can…: Heb. know not to be satisfied\f*

\w Come|strong="H0857"\w* ye, \add say they\add*, I will \w fetch|strong="H3947"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, and we will \w fill|strong="H5433"\w* ourselves with strong \w drink|strong="H7941"\w*; and to \w morrow|strong="H4279"\w* shall be as this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add and\add* \w much|strong="H3966"\w* \w more|strong="H3499"\w* \w abundant|strong="H1419"\w*.
